headline: After Plunging 14.4% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why the Trend Might Reverse for APTIV HLDS LTD (APTV)
summary: The heavy selling pressure might have exhausted for APTIV HLDS LTD (APTV) as it is technically in oversold territory now. In addition to this technical measure, strong agreement among Wall Street analysts in revising earnings estimates higher indicates that the stock is ripe for a trend reversal.
